Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Lelion Way, just west of the intersection with Necropolis Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: There's nothing really to see on the north side of the road except a lot of stale swamp water. There are supposed to be some good magical components in the swamp, though. On the south, you can see the back side of a large shopping center, the entrance to which is located on the other side of the building. Necropolis Avenue is to the east.
